Package roborally.events

Class Events

  • java.lang.Object
    • roborally.events.Events
  • public class Events
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles events in the game. An event is computation stretched over time, to make the visualization of the game possible to follow as a human player. Takes use of time spent between frames in render to scale the events.

        public void setGameSpeed​(java.lang.String gameSpeed)

        Parameters:
        gameSpeed - the limit.

      • waitMoveEvent

                          IGame game)

        Parameters:
        dt - Time lapsed between frames.
        game - The game.
